roleset.name: looking backward (hindsight)
roleset.note: RETROSPECT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WordNet. No VNcls. (from retrospect.01-n)

role.descr: thing in the past looked backward at

example.name: both args
example.text: In his retrospect of the information recieved they simply didn't understand and, especially, have a reference for what they were looking at so it was somewhat overlooked except for the magnitude of that then-coming event.
